revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Airlink101 |model=AR420W |revision= |upc=658729080461 |ean= |asin=B000BUNGLO |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/15/2004 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=Gemtek |manuf_model=WRTA-108GD |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=MXF-R930720G |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR2313A |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=ICSI |ram1_model=IC42S16400-7T |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2313A |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR2112 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6060 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=default |default_ssid_regex=^default$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:14:A5 |oui_eth=00:14:A5 |default_ch= }} {{TagLine|Super G Wireless Router}} :[http://www.airlink101.com/products/ar420w.php Product page]
OEM Gemtek WRTA-108GD (WRTA-108GD_V03), see below
Per [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=36908 this DD-WRT forums post], the board identifier is the same as the [[Dell Wireless 2350 Broadband Router (WRTA-108GD)]] (board pictures). As such, this device is presumed to use AR2313A.
Per the [http://airlink101.com/download/download_links/ar420w_manual.pdf manual], the default SSID is '''default'''.
[http://www.lemmke.org/arl/DATA/hardware/other/small_network_appliances/small_network_appliances.4.en.html On the Lemmke list]
